html:
The following clause cause an asymmetry and an inequality between Youtube and the user, which could be avoided. 

"These Terms of Service, and any rights and licenses granted  hereunder, may not be transferred or assigned by you, but may     be assigned by YouTube without restriction. "


--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: another point about governance
text:
The following clause cause an asymmetry and an inequality between Youtube
and the user, which could be avoided.

"These Terms of Service, and any rights and licenses granted  hereunder,
may not be transferred or assigned by you, but may     be assigned by
YouTube without restriction. "

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---
